title: FatBoy One
content:
Hi Typophilers,

This is a typeface I've been working on for over 2 years now. I want to round it up and put it on my website which will be ready in some days.  
For my site I'm looking for an image or styling that could go with it. For all my other fonts I have made designs that fit to the font. Have a look here at some examples (see 'related links'):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/accelerator/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/accelerator/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/accelerator/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/shell-shock/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/shell-shock/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/characters/shell-shock/")

But for FatBoy I can't seem to find a good image to accompany it. Is there anyone that has a tip for me?

If you have any other crits regarding the font, please shoot.

Thanx,  
®ené

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RV©FatBoyOne.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/typophile.com/files/RV%C2%A9FatBoyOne.pdf) | 35.29 KB |
author: Rene Verkaart

comments.content: How about the back pocket or just the ass of of some baggy funky jeans?

Not bad at all. Perhaps I make something like a productlable on a jeans. Good idea.

THNX, ®

\*\*\* [www.characters.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.characters.nl/ "www.characters.nl") { Typography to express yourself } \*\*\*
first thing I think of is a go-cart ... like a soap box derby car maybe?
For some reason, I see it in a yellow-green on a hoagie sign... maybe a philly cheese steak?

I think I found a very funny one. Take a look at FatBoy One on my site.  
The photograph is from my brother, Marcel:  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mutz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/mutz "http://www.flickr.com/photos/mutz")

Regards,  
®ené

**Also tired of Helvetica?** Get an **[Insider](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.characters.nl/)** with more personality

\*\*\* [www.characters.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.characters.nl/ "www.characters.nl") { Typography to express yourself } \*\*\*
I went to look but I don't see it. Unless you mean the pig...

Yep, I meant the pig. Before you had a look there was a gray empty area.  
I have a good feeling with this photo. FatBoy One and the pig do it for me.

Regards,  
René

**Also tired of Helvetica?** Get an **[Insider](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.characters.nl/)** with more personality

\*\*\* [www.characters.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724024009/http:/www.characters.nl/ "www.characters.nl") { Typography to express yourself } \*\*\*
